## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c5ccc40a08ace658e1c2bb67a692e4a04f1c6c826a6cfbf7c2bec41d0f54c540)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'xmlbuilder3' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
